    public class Languages
extends java.lang.Object

    1.0
    Author:
    Raphael A., Fabian, Felix

      • getLanguage

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getLanguage(java.lang.String language)
        Description copied from interface: ILanguages
        get a specific language by using its name as parameter, undefined languages will result in getting the default language
        Specified by:
        getLanguage in interface ILanguages
        Parameters:
        language - the languages name as string
        Returns:
        the Hashmap of the corresponding language, does return DEFAULT_LANGUAGE (English) if language is not found.

      • getLanguages

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getLanguages()
        Description copied from interface: ILanguages
        get all the languages as Map the key of the outer Map is the name of the Language e.g. "English" the Key of the inner one are field-identifiers like "menu_info"
        Specified by:
        getLanguages in interface ILanguages
        Returns:
        all languages

        Specified by:
        getLanguageNames in interface ILanguages
        Returns:
        a list with all the language name strings
